content: If you notice him throw out sand and then raise his hand high while it begins to glow, be ready for him to summon his secret weapon — a large bladed ring with barbs that he can employ for the rest of his combo.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drunken_Boar_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Drunken Boar Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Yellow-Robed Squire'.
The content is as follows:
If you notice him throw out sand and then raise his hand high while it begins to glow, be ready for him to summon his secret weapon — a large bladed ring with barbs that he can employ for the rest of his combo.
